Chants

  • Blue, White, Dynomite

    We’re blue !

    We’re white !

    We’re fucking dynomite !

    We’re Halifax, we’re Halifax.

  • We Are Here

    One oh eight, we are here

    Oh oh, oh oh

    One oh eight, we are here

    Oh oh, oh oh

    One oh eight, we are here

    Getting rowdy drinking beer !

    Oh oh oh, oh oh, oh oh
